alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued April 19 at 1:56PM MDT until April 20 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected for areas east of the San Rafael Swell. * WHERE...San Rafael Swell and surrounding areas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions may damage crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
